hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/applications/content_server/resources #if 71 folder does not exist, will create folder [ ! -d 71/ ] && mkdir 71
#if 71 folder exists, will now then extract to this folder [ -d 71/ ] && tar xvzf 71.tar.gz -C 71/
#regular connector run cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors php wikimedia_partial.php _
cd /var/www/html/eol_php_code/applications/content_server/resources # now delete temp /71/ folder [ -d 71/ ] && rm -rf 71/
